alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Mountains; Chuckwalla Valley; Imperial County Southeast; Imperial County Southwest; Imperial County West; Imperial Valley; Palo Verde Valley; Salton Sea (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:00AM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS WITH NEW THUNDERSTORM DEVELOPMENT EXPECTED ACROSS SOUTHWESTERN LA PAZ...NORTHWESTERN YUMA...IMPERIAL AND EASTERN RIVERSIDE COUNTIES THROUGH 300 AM MST/PDT... At 1253 AM MST/1253 AM PDT/, radar indicated an outflow boundary pushing northwestward into the lower Colorado River Valley. This is resulting strong wind gusts as well as new thunderstorm development. Wind gusts up to 50 mph will be possible. Strong, gusty winds will be capable of producing areas of blowing dust with reduced visibilities potentially as low as one mile at times. Locations impacted include... Yuma, El Centro, Calexico, Brawley, Imperial, Plaster City, Martinez Lake, Blythe, Holtville, Quartzsite, Westmorland, Nicholls Warm Springs, Cibola, Palo Verde, Brenda, Andrade, Winterhaven, Vicksburg Junction, Vicksburg, and Gordon`s Well. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 1 and 49. CA Interstate 10 between mile markers 116 and 156. AZ Interstate 8 near mile marker 1.
